title: Dino Gnar and Yasuo possible bugs
body: I was playing with Dino {{champion:150}}  one match, and twice when recalling, blocks wouldn't show up after looking at another part of the map and the going back to {{champion:150}} . I was also playing with PROJECT:{{champion:157}} after getting it from mystery gift, and as you may already know, he has interactions with {{champion:92}} 's Q. I was dead at one point, then {{champion:92}}  used Broken Wings, and despite being dead, {{champion:157}}  still said "Huh... Three swift strikes..."

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on. :]
The Yasuo dialogue bug happened in a match that my friend and I played and we laughed uncontrollably. Please leave it in xD
